name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Timothy CURTIS, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Timothy CURTIS, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 10th day of August, 2009, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal Nunc Pro Tunc, treated as a Petition for Review, is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
980 A.2d 32
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Timothy CURTIS, Petitioner.
Nos. 85 EM 2009 & 86 EM 2009.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Aug. 10, 2009.
